definitions.definition: A historical region of northeastern China comprising the three provinces of Liaoning , Jilin , and Heilongjiang and the northeastern part of Inner Mongolia .
examples: The senior Japanese commanders and all ground, sea, air and auxiliary forces within Manchuria , Korea north of 38 north latitude and Karafuto shall surrender to the Commander in Chief of Soviet Forces in the Far East. ( General Order No. 1 , 1945)

definitions.definition: The area traditionally inhabited by the Manchu people and their Jurchen predecessors , in modern China and Russia .
Synonym of Manchukuo : a former puppet state of Imperial Japan .
